quotes.quote: It is hidden but always present.
We are hidden in ourselves, like a truth hidden in isolated facts. When we know that this One in us is One in all, then our truth is revealed.
There are secret opportunities hidden inside every failure.
There is nothing so far removed from us to be beyond our reach, or so far hidden that we cannot discover it.
Hidden behind your fears and your failures is the success you seek.
The best hiding spots are not the most hidden; they're merely the least searched.
What hidden, hoarded longings there are in all of us.
Some people have a hidden richness waiting to be discovered. They don't advertise it, but it's there for those willing to scratch beneath the surface.
The love hidden within is always greater than the hate displayed without.
The hidden hand of the market will never work without a hidden fist.
The hidden strength is too deep a secret. But in the end...in the end it is our only ally.
Every obstacle is a hidden step on the path to promotion.
The Way is hidden and nameless. Still only the Way nourishes and completes.
There's hidden sweetness in the stomach's emptiness.
Hidden in the glorious wildness like unmined gold.
If differences can be hidden, perhaps they aren't differences at all.
God is hidden inside us and everyone is looking for Him.
The future is hidden even from those who make it.
There are mountains hidden in mountains. There are mountains hidden in hiddenness. This is complete understanding.
There's no hidden secrets going on in the Federal Reserve
The hidden harmony is better than the obvious.
A hidden connection is stronger than an obvious one.
Find your hidden talents, your hidden potentials, your hidden purposes and convert them into a better business for the benefit of the entire world.
Everything we see hides another thing, we always want to see what is hidden by what we see.
Hidden paths can't be walked without moving obstacles.
Wealth is the hidden side of speed and speed the hidden side of wealth.
Three things cannot long be hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
Truth is hidden only to the masses who are not inquisitive.
Hidden knowledge differs little from ignorance.
Problems are hidden opportunities, and constraints can actually boost creativity.
Where the truth remains hidden from the outside, the inside imprisons the hidden.
For every loss, there is a hidden gain. And for every gain, there is a hidden loss.
You can hide from others, but you can't hide from yourself.
